segments.text: I am in Nanjing University . I am a junior .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you choose to attend that college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because it enjoys great reputation and it is located in my favorite city Nanjing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of college is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ii is distinguished for the strength of law and foreign languages studies ..
segments.speaker: S2
